name: Drawn To Life: The Last Stop
name_original: Drawn To Life: The Last Stop
description:
The fan-driven continuation of the Drawn to Life series unfolds! Directly building upon the first two games in the series, Drawn to Life: The Last Stop introduces new tools to make your adventure, your way. Use the select tool to rearrange your drawings, use the save template feature to export your creations or import old ones, or plug in a drawing tablet and gain new levels of precision.

Emerging from the events of Drawn to Life: The Next Chapter, the Raposa awaken in a world fracturing to pieces. Armed by the Creator with a train that can traverse the broken landscape, they set off to light the world's Eternal Flames.

But all the while, they find themselves asking one simple question... Just what kind of Creator are you?

This demo contains just the drawing screen of the final game. Try it out and let us know what you think!

Join our discord server to get the latest news and to share your creations.
